tool_description: Use Great Circle Mapper to calculate the air distance and flight time between all airports worldwide.
name: Great Circle Mapper
title: Great Circle Mapper

api_list.name: Aircraft Type Read
api_list.description: get aircraft type data by IATA or ICAO code

required_parameters.name: icao_iata
required_parameters.description: ICAO 3 letter or IATA 2 letter code

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://greatcirclemapper.p.rapidapi.com/aircraft/read/A388"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greatcirclemapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://greatcirclemapper.p.rapidapi.com/aircraft/read/{icao_iata}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greatcirclemapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Air Route Calculation
api_list.description: calculate distance and flight time for any airports and any speed

required_parameters.name: route
required_parameters.description: ICAO airport cides, separated by hyphens

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://greatcirclemapper.p.rapidapi.com/airports/route/EGLL-KJFK/510"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greatcirclemapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://greatcirclemapper.p.rapidapi.com/airports/route/{route}/{speed}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greatcirclemapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Airport Search
api_list.description: get a list of airport records

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: ICAO code, IATA code, town, airport name

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://greatcirclemapper.p.rapidapi.com/airports/search/Cologne"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greatcirclemapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://greatcirclemapper.p.rapidapi.com/airports/search/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greatcirclemapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Airport Read
api_list.description: get airport by IATA code or ICAO code
api_list.code:

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
